content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -48.0 to -11.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -48.0) with a fuel inventory of 13 coal, currently not smelting due to lack of ingredients.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) with a fuel inventory of 34 coal, currently not smelting due to lack of ingredients.
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) with a fuel inventory of 45 coal, currently not smelting due to lack of ingredients.

### Iron Plate Storage Area
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (-11.5, -50.5) with a full inventory of 1600 iron plates.
- Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -50.5) currently empty.

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage Facility at Position (4.5, -58.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (4.0, -60.0) with a fuel inventory of 19 coal, actively mining iron ore with a warning that the chest at drop position is full.
- Wooden Chest at position (4.5, -58.5) with an inventory of 6 iron ore.
- Additional wooden chests at positions (5.5, -60.5), (7.5, -60.5), (6.5, -60.5), (9.5, -60.5), and (8.5, -60.5), all currently empty.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Inserting Items into Full Inventory
- Ensure that the target inventory has enough space before attempting to insert items. Consider adding additional storage or managing existing inventory levels to prevent overflow.

### Errors when Placing Entities without Required Items
- Verify that the necessary items are present in the inventory before attempting to place entities. Craft or acquire the required items beforehand to avoid placement failures.

## NAMESPACE

### Utility Functions
- `insert_item`: Used to insert items into a specified container. Failure occurs when the target container is full.
- `place_entity`: Used to place entities on the map. Failure occurs when the required item is not available in the inventory.

### Important Variables
- `additional_storage_chest`: Represents the position or reference to an additional storage chest.
- `iron_plates_in_inventory`: Integer representing the count of iron plates currently in the player's inventory.
